amendment.description: Amendment sought to establish a national water-based freight policy to improve the movement of freight and cargo over waterways, canals, ports, and harbors.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Velazquez amendment (A009) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A009) offered by Ms. Velazquez.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Velazquez amendment (A009) Failed by voice vote.
